column1: neuoe uneukwenya makotikoti ure kaba ke bohobe
neuoe mootle oatella ha ale habo
yaka e kholo le ya neuoe e kholo
yaka e kholo le ya neuoe
ke eng kenekere kaba ke keneuoe
ke ya mang jwale tsila ntso
ha ntate koma teng hona le masapo
ha wena ukwatile rona renerebua hamonate
neuoe we ake ubone ubatla honqhadisa dijo
ketlare neuoe ausi mantso oneahlahola hare ka masimong
ae eseng letswai lekotikoti laka leneletsetsa dibiri
